SEARCH
Package com.cy_siao.model.person

Class Relationship

java.lang.Object
com.cy_siao.model.person.Relationship
public class Relationship extends Object
Represents a relationship between two persons (e.g., family, couple, etc.) and provides operations for assigning them to beds and searching availability.

    • searchAvailableBed

      public List<Bed> searchAvailableBed(String gender, int age, LocalDate arrival, LocalDate departure, List<Room> rooms)
      Searches available beds matching criteria for the relationship group.
      Parameters:
      gender - of the person we want to match with bed
      age - of the person we want to match with bed
      arrival - date of the person for his stay
      departure - date of the person for his stay
      rooms - list of rooms where we search beds
      Returns:
      list of bed where we can place the person with this criteria

    • assignGroup

      public boolean assignGroup(List<Room> rooms, LocalDate arrival, LocalDate departure, boolean sameRoom)
      Assigns the people in the relationship to available beds, respecting room sharing if required.
      Parameters:
      rooms - list of room to choose a room between them to assign the two people
      arrival - date when the two people come
      departure - date when the two people go
      sameRoom - boolean which are true if the two people need to be in the same room
      Returns:
      true if is possible to find a room or rooms with beds which respect group condition, false otherwise

    • displayOccupation

      public void displayOccupation()
      Displays current occupation of persons in the relationship.
